content: needles go back to the ball of yarn and using dpns co 6 sts using long tail cast on and knit i-cord for 10 inches or desired length of tie now you will attach the i-cord tie to the neck edge of the bonnet as you knit the i-cord row 1 k5 then k2tog tbl the last st of the i-cord on your dpns with the first st you picked up from the neck edge of the bonnet repeat row 1 working the last st of the i-cord with a st from the neck edge of the bonnet until you ve worked the i-cord all the way around the neck edge then continue knitting i-cord to create the other tie knit it the same length you knit the first tie bobble all sts break yarn weave in ends block enjoy your bonnet abbreviations bobble bind off co cast on dpns double pointed needles k knit k2tog knit 2 together k2tog tbl knit 2 together through the back loop p purl rs right side of your work ssk slip slip knit st s stitch es ws wrong side of your work yo yarn over 3
